text:
Created attachment 27020
Patch to Makefile.in

a patch for APR's build system (trunk) so that httpd won't
need a complete source tree to find it, but will be happy with
an installed version.



Please also refer to:

http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/apr-dev/201105.mbox/%3C9940e262-86f7-42e4-a9d5-d1c729fb2c2e@iris%3E
creator: i.galic@brainsware.org

text:
Commit to applying this, it is the behavior of most linux vendors.  We likely
need something sensible for win32 in these regards.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
